title: Dogville
tagline: A quiet little town not far from here
plot: A woman on the run from the mob is reluctantly accepted in a small Colorado community in exchange for labor, but when a search visits the town she finds out that their support has a price.

title: Climax
tagline: Des Danseurs, Une Fete, Des Vinyles, Une Sangria
plot: French dancers gather in a remote, empty school building to rehearse on a wintry night. The all-night celebration morphs into a hallucinatory nightmare when they learn their sangria is laced with LSD.

title: High and Low
tagline: 142 Screenful Minutes of Thrills and Suspense!
plot: An executive of a shoe company becomes a victim of extortion when his chauffeur's son is kidnapped and held for ransom.
awards: Nominated for 1 Golden Globe. Another 3 wins & 2 nominations

title: Taxi Driver
tagline: On every street in every city in this country, there's a nobody who dreams of being a somebody
plot: A mentally unstable veteran works as a nighttime taxi driver in New York City, where the perceived decadence and sleaze fuels his urge for violent action by attempting to liberate a presidential campaign worker and an underage prostitute.
awards: Nominated for 4 Oscars. Another 21 wins & 16 nominations

title: Fallen Angels
tagline: I wish I could tell her some problems can't be solved over the phone
plot: This Hong Kong-set crime drama follows the lives of a hitman, hoping to get out of the business, and his elusive female partner.

title: Irréversible
plot: Events over the course of one traumatic night in Paris unfold in reverse-chronological order as the beautiful Alex is brutally raped and beaten by a stranger in the underpass.

title: Barry Lyndon
tagline: After reaching the top, where can you go...except down?
plot: An Irish rogue wins the heart of a rich widow and assumes her dead husband's aristocratic position in 18th-century England.

title: Stalker
tagline: Passion is the friction between one's soul and the outside world
plot: A guide leads two men through an area known as the Zone to find a room that grants wishes.

title: Heart of a Dog
tagline: One can find time for everything if one is never in a hurry
plot: In the wake of the Russian revolution, Professor Preobrazhensky rescues a starving dog from the gutter, and attempts to transform him into a man. Based on Mikhail Bulgakov's novel of the same name.

title: Come and see
plot: After finding an old rifle, a young boy joins the Soviet resistance movement against ruthless German forces and experiences the horrors of World War II.

title: Pulp Fiction
tagline: From the creators of 'True Romance' & 'Reservoir Dogs
plot: The lives of two mob hitmen, a boxer, a gangster and his wife, and a pair of diner bandits intertwine in four tales of violence and redemption.

title: Goodfellas
plot: The story of Henry Hill and his life in the mob, covering his relationship with his wife Karen Hill and his mob partners Jimmy Conway and Tommy DeVito in the Italian-American crime syndicate.

title: The Godfather
plot: An organized crime dynasty's aging patriarch transfers control of his clandestine empire to his reluctant son.

title: Pi
plot: A paranoid mathematician searches for a key number that will unlock the universal patterns found in nature.

title: Pusher
tagline: Du har ikke en chance. Grib den
plot: A drug pusher grows increasingly desperate after a botched deal leaves him with a large debt to a ruthless drug lord.

title: L'eclisse
tagline: ... the ache and ecstasy of love...
plot: A young woman meets a vital young man, but their love affair is doomed because of the man's materialistic nature.

title: Mulholland Dr.
tagline: A Love Story In The City Of Dreams
plot: After a car wreck on the winding Mulholland Drive renders a woman amnesiac, she and a perky Hollywood-hopeful search for clues and answers across Los Angeles in a twisting venture beyond dreams and reality.
awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 49 wins & 60 nominations

title: Dust
tagline: Everything you see, everything you know, everything you love is DUST, DUST, DUST
plot: The genre of the film DUST could be called fantastic realism or existential drama with elements of the fantastic. Dust means the haste in which people live. Dust is a common misconception, the natural clogging up of the brain.

title: Morphine
tagline: And loneliness is important, significant thoughts, it is contemplation, calmness, wisdom ...
plot: A drama that chronicles the civil war that raged after the 1917 Bolshevik revolution.

title: Rocco and his brothers
tagline: DARING in its realism. STUNNING in its impact. BREATHTAKING in its scope.
plot: Having recently been uprooted to Milan, Rocco and his four brothers each look for a new way in life when a prostitute comes between Rocco and his brother Simone.
awards: Nominated for 2 BAFTA Film Awards. Another 10 wins & 8 nominations
